requestBody.title: Owner creates primary location API Trace

data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The User Shares One Availability Contract with a Business (Internal + External). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.title: Owner creates primary location API Trace
